description: CSS styles for managing themes and components of a Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main class for the application, styles the overall layout and theme.

classes.name: ttt-panel
classes.description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe game panel, including layout and shadows.

classes.name: ttt-square
classes.description: Styles for each square in the Tic Tac Toe board, including hover effects.

classes.name: ttt-restart-btn
classes.description: Styles for the restart button of the game, including hover effects.
